title: Home
intro: Viola Lukács is a Geneva-based curator, researcher and art professional with interest in transdisciplinary cultural activity.
She has curated exhibitions at the Plutschow Gallery in Zürich, Pavillion Sicli in Geneva, and dOCUMENTA(13) in Germany.
